The Mystery of the Hidden Treasure

A clique of ten friends living in the same town, find an antiquated paper which turns out to be a map while playing. They set out on a quest to find the hidden treasure in the woods but a bully who despises them, with the help of her sister who is one of the ten friends, also sets out to find the treasure. Will the bully retrieve the treasure first and become the heroine of the town or will the ten friends get it before her and become the heroes? Join the clique on their quest to find the hidden treasure.
